Title: 37162 - # Companies That Are Committed to Giving Back
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 companies that are committed to giving back to the community. There are many companies that have charitable missions. Talk about companies from different industries that are truly passionate about making a difference. You can mention the client link by bringing up Amway whose company mentions giving back in their mission statement. Your target audience is well-informed adults that are interested in lifestyle and technology.
Client Comment: example AT: direct selling with Amway
